    CodexInspectorController
    The CodexInspectorController class manages the visual representation of the player's codex in the GUI.

    The CreateGameMenuController class handles the user interactions for creating a new game
    ErrorViewController
    The ErrorViewController class handles the display of error messages in the GUI
    GameController
    The GameController class handles the interactions and visual representation of the game state in the GUI
    GameListMenuController
    The GameListMenuController class manages the interface for displaying and interacting with the list of available games
    LoginMenuController
    The LoginMenuController class manages the user login interface, allowing the user to enter their name and select a color
    MainMenuController
    The MainMenuController class handles the interactions for the main menu of the GUI.
    PersonalGoalSelectionMenuController
    The PersonalGoalSelectionMenuController class handles the interface for selecting personal goals in the GUI
    PlateauController
    The PlateauController class handles the visual representation of the game plateau, including player tokens and their positions based on scores
    SelectInitialCardSideController
    The SelectInitialCardSideController class handles the selection of the initial card side in the GUI
